ygData.subject: RE: New Bard with some questions
ygData.msgSnippet: It is 5* your level, at least has been for me all the way to 15th.  But Weapon skills are 5*(Your level + 1).  That makes weapons 80 for me, but Off/Def only
ygData.messageBody:
It is 5* your level, at least has been for me all the way to 15th. But
Weapon skills are 5*(Your level + 1). That makes weapons 80 for me, but
Off/Def only 75.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Gifford [mailto:giffords@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 3:46 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard with some questions


From: "Sean Gifford" <giffords@...>

nope, I have to doubt that For BARDS It is definelty less than 5, whether
it is 4 or 3 I am not certain but It is not level 80 like my other skills.
----- Original Message -----
From: <chlebek@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:28 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard with some questions


From: chlebek@...




> I don't know about hand to hand but Offense
> and Defense are only 4 skill levels per level.

Nope. Offense and Defense are 5x level. Most other skills (except HtoH) are
5x +
5.

Taelin
